description: The Jin army broke through Dongjing, captured Emperor Huizong and Emperor Qinzong of the Song dynasty, as well as a large number of members of the Zhao royal family, palace concubines, noble ministers, and officials, leading to the fall of the Northern Song Dynasty

event: Yue Fei's Resistance Against the Jin
description: Yue Fei led the Yue Army to repeatedly defeat the Jin army and recover lost territories
